verses.text: \w After|strong="H1961"\w* \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w established|strong="H3559"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w sovereignty|strong="H4438"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w royal|strong="H4438"\w* \w power|strong="H3559"\w*, \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w* \w forsook|strong="H5800"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Law|strong="H8451"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w In|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w*’s reign, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w unfaithful|strong="H4603"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w Shishak|strong="H7895"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w attacked|strong="H5927"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*

\w with|strong="H5973"\w* 1,200 \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, 60,000 \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* countless \w troops|strong="H5971"\w* \w who|strong="H5971"\w* \w came|strong="H4714"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w* out \w of|strong="H4557"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*—\w Libyans|strong="H3864"\w*, \w Sukkites|strong="H5525"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* Cushites.

\w He|strong="H5704"\w* \w captured|strong="H3920"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w fortified|strong="H4694"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w came|strong="H3063"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w far|strong="H5704"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3068"\w* \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w came|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w leaders|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* gathered \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w because|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Shishak|strong="H7895"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*, “\w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w You|strong="H6440"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* \w Me|strong="H6440"\w*; \w therefore|strong="H3068"\w*, \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Shishak|strong="H7895"\w*.’”

So \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w leaders|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w humbled|strong="H3665"\w* \w themselves|strong="H3665"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* said, “\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*.”

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w humbled|strong="H3665"\w* \w themselves|strong="H1992"\w*, \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*, “\w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w humbled|strong="H3665"\w* \w themselves|strong="H1992"\w*; \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w soon|strong="H4592"\w* \w grant|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w deliverance|strong="H6413"\w*. \w My|strong="H5414"\w* \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w poured|strong="H5413"\w* \w out|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H7200"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w Shishak|strong="H7895"\w*.

\w Nevertheless|strong="H3588"\w*, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H3045"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w learn|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* difference \w between|strong="H3045"\w* \w serving|strong="H5656"\w* \w Me|strong="H5650"\w* \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w serving|strong="H5656"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* kings \w of|strong="H5650"\w* other lands.”

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Shishak|strong="H7895"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w attacked|strong="H5927"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w seized|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* treasures \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w royal|strong="H4428"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w*. \w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w everything|strong="H3605"\w*, \w including|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w shields|strong="H4043"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H6213"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w bronze|strong="H5178"\w* \w shields|strong="H4043"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w place|strong="H8478"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w committed|strong="H6213"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w care|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w guard|strong="H8104"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w duty|strong="H5921"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w entrance|strong="H6607"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w royal|strong="H4428"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w whenever|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* entered \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w guards|strong="H7323"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H7725"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w him|strong="H7725"\w*, \w bearing|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* shields, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w later|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w them|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w guardroom|strong="H8372"\w*.

\w Because|strong="H4480"\w* Rehoboam \w humbled|strong="H3665"\w* \w himself|strong="H3665"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* anger \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w him|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w did|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* \w him|strong="H7725"\w* \w completely|strong="H3617"\w*. \w Indeed|strong="H1571"\w*, \w conditions|strong="H1697"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

Thus \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w* \w established|strong="H7760"\w* \w himself|strong="H2388"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w*. \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* forty-one \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w became|strong="H4427"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w seventeen|strong="H7651"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* chosen \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w His|strong="H3605"\w* \w Name|strong="H8034"\w*. \w His|strong="H3605"\w* mother’s \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w Naamah|strong="H5279"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Ammonite.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* Rehoboam \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w set|strong="H3559"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w acts|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w*, \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* last, \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w records|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Iddo|strong="H5714"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Seer|strong="H2374"\w* \w concerning|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w genealogies|strong="H3187"\w*? \w There|strong="H1992"\w* \w was|strong="H1697"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w* \w between|strong="H4421"\w* \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w throughout|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w* \w rested|strong="H7901"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* fathers \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* \w in|strong="H6912"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* \w City|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* Abijah \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w in|strong="H6912"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* \w place|strong="H8478"\w*.
